text: E dɔxɔbooree fan naxa fa donse ra kelife ra Isakari bɔxi, Sabulon bɔxi, nun Nafatali bɔxi ma. E naxa fa na ra sofalee, ɲɔxɔmɛe, soee, nun ningee fari. E naxa fa kote mɔɔli birin na alɔ donse, farin, xɔrɛ xaraxi, wɛni bogi xaraxi, wɛni, ture, xuruse lanma nun a xungbe. E naxa fa a gbegbe ra barima Isirayilaka birin nu sɛɛwaxi.
